bug.author: aryanvikash
bug.summary: Why my private repo names are in public ?

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.54. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/machine-learning-apps/Issue-Label-Bot>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

Try <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apps/issue-label-bot>https://github.com/apps/issue-label-bot</denchmark-link> , "Configure", select your own account, then instead of "all repositories" you should select specific repos you want to enable this bot on.
